title: Throws Error:500 when clicking on "Create App" button.... http://apps.windowsstore.com/Application/CreateFromTemplate?templateId=22284
body:
Throws Error:500 when clicking on "Create App" button....
http://apps.windowsstore.com/Application/CreateFromTemplate?templateId=22284

comments.body:
"stk500_recv(): programmer is not responding" is encountered uploading an Arduino Uno sketch
USB_3 port is not recognizes using Control/hardware and soun/Devices and printers/Unspecified Item.
